sentence: "As Rep Marjorie Taylor Greene and Rep Paul Gosar speak at this white supremacist, anti-Semitic, pro-Putin event, silence by Republican Party leaders is deafening and enabling," Cheney said in a tweet.
author: Blarp Blog
title: Romney on Greene, Gosar: 'I have morons on my team'

sentence: The Republicans who voted against the resolution - Reps Paul Gosar of Arizona, Thomas Massie of Kentucky, and Matt Rosendale of Montana - were swiftly attacked on social media.
author: Sravasti Dasgupta
title: Three Republicans under fire for voting against House resolution to ‘stand with Ukraine’ amid Russia invasion

sentence: It took him a week to speak to Rep. Paul Gosar (R-AZ), who had tweeted a violent video featuring Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez.
author: Emily Singer
title: House Republicans Enraged By Cawthorn’s ‘Orgy’ And 'Cocaine Bump' Claims
